author: PFCal-dev
body:
The following HGCAL TPG bug fixes are included in this PR:
  * Fix of a regression in trigger towers affecting their position (all towers produced on the positive side)
  * 3D cone clustering fix (minor impact, see comparison [slides](https://github.com/PFCal-dev/cmssw/files/2256960/18.08.01.3D.clustering.fix.pdf))
  * Fix wrong wafer type of cells retrieved from trigger cells
title: [HGCAL trigger] Bugfixes
